subject: Re: Ask Haptic module
description_text:
No worries, thank you. It's fine if it's Monday, I'm not worried about 3 or 4 days haha, I can't wait to receive everything and test it!

> Le 29 oct. 2025 à 08:43, support@simsonn.com a écrit :
> 
> Hi Mattéo Perrin,
> 
> We're glad to we can help you. Your order has been shipped, but the Pro X Ultra baseplate is currently out of stock at our German warehouse. We'll ship it to you once it's restocked next Monday.

conversations.body_text: Thank you for your understanding. Have fun!

Hello, I hope you're doing well? I was just checking in to see if my baseplate can still be shipped today, as you told me at the beginning of last week? I've already received the pedals, and I'm receiving the haptics tomorrow, so all I'm missing now is the baseplate, haha! Thank you in advance for your reply!

order number #SSN3122


> Le 29 oct. 2025 à 11:29, support@simsonn.com a écrit :
> 
> ﻿
> Thank you for your understanding. Have fun!
> 
> 5405:4206036

Hi Mattéo Perrin,    We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock for the base plates, and restocking has been severely delayed due to customs clearance backlogs. We will ship your base plates via DHL Express within the next couple of days. We deeply regret the delay.

Do you potentially have a date? Because I'm going abroad soon, so I'd like to know if it will be before then or not at all... Thank you in advance.

> Le 3 nov. 2025 à 14:23, Mattéo Perrin <matteohand21@gmail.com> a écrit :
> 
> ﻿

Hi Mattéo Perrin,     Once the goods arrive at the warehouse in the next couple of days, we will arrange shipment immediately. Delivery is expected around the 8th.

Okay, no problem, we'll wait until the 8th then, thank you anyway!


Le mar. 4 nov. 2025 à 11:48, support@simsonn.com

Hello, I saw that the baseplate has been shipped, thank you for keeping your word regarding the delivery times, which is rare these days with some companies. I'm already really looking forward to receiving it and finally being able to test this superb pedalboard! ??

And finally, I have one last quick question regarding the pedal assembly. On the brake pedal, there's a small wire that isn't connected to anything (see photo below), and I wanted to ask you where it should be connected so I can be sure I don't make a mistake?  Thank you again so much for all your answers and help.

> Le 4 nov. 2025 à 11:48, support@simsonn.com a écrit :

Hi Mattéo Perrin,    Thank you for your patience and understanding. We sincerely apologize for any delays or inconvenience caused.
